title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.629 - Purging of pipelines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.629 - Purging of pipelines

State Regulations

All purging shall be carried out in accordance with

Purging Principles and Practice (as described in section
10.3
of this Title), published by
the American Gas Association, Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.629

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
